name: AGB Education PTE LTD
description: An experienced entity in the areas of technology and employability training, AGB Education Centre has, for the past decade, impacted the lives of more than 100,000 individuals to achieve greater career success in their professional development. As a testament to the success of its training outcomes, AGB Education Centre has also spearheaded many nation-wide programmes in Singapore, supporting Employers, Job Seekers and Corporate Organisations in their employability journey. Forging alliances and partnerships together with the forefront of leading establishments and institutions, AGB Education Centre is equipped to educate the latest shifts and development in the fields of innovation and advancement for a best-in-class experience to our clients.
business_objectives: Accelerate Skill Development and Learning Efficiency
Headline:
Upgrading Skills.
 Enabling Progress.
ShortDescription: An experienced entity in the areas of technology and employability training, AGB Education Centre has, for the past decade, impacted the lives of more than 100,000 individuals to achieve greater career success in their professional development.
enhanced_description: AGB Education Centre, established in 2008, is an experienced entity specializing in technology and employability training. Over the past decade, it has positively impacted more than 100,000 individuals, enabling greater career success and professional development. The company has spearheaded numerous nation-wide programs in Singapore, supporting Employers, Job Seekers, and Corporate Organisations in their employability journeys. By forging alliances with leading establishments and institutions, AGB Education Centre is equipped to educate clients on the latest shifts and developments in innovation and advancement, aiming to provide a best-in-class experience.
key_use_cases: Accelerating skill development for individuals and organizations
Enhancing employability through technology and professional development training
competitive_advantages: Over a decade of experience in technology and employability training (launched 2008)
Impacted more than 100,000 individuals for career success
Spearheaded many nation-wide employability programs in Singapore
Established alliances and partnerships with leading establishments and institutions
Equipped to educate on the latest shifts and developments in innovation and advancement
roi_benefits: Professional development for employees and job seekers
